title: RBI set to announce policy decision as markets eye potential rate cut
description: Market participants are closely watching whether the RBI will cut the repo rate from its current 6.5%, amid easing inflation and expectations of a US Federal Reserve rate cut next week
content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) will announce its monetary policy decision likely on Friday morning, following a three-day meeting of the Monetary Policy Committee that began on Wednesday. RBI Govern… [+1645 chars]
